name: MeTube
short_description: Web UI for yt-dlp - download videos/audio from YouTube and 1700+ sites.
description: MeTube is a web frontend for yt-dlp, the powerful video/audio downloader. It allows you to download videos and audio from YouTube and 1700+ other sites through a clean web interface. Features include URL queue, download progress, automatic format selection, playlist support, authentication for premium content, and simple queue management.
usecases: Download YouTube videos for offline viewing.
Extract audio as MP3 from videos.
